comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: I blogged about Charles Proteus Steinmetz here, last time there was a photo of him in the uploads: disstud.blogspot.com/2011/01/cp-steinmetz-loc.html So, same guy: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5375682562/]

comment.author: 62379908@N00
comment._content: Easily recognizable. He had no neck.  But he was a really smart guy.

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Though the date written on the negative is 3/4/22, the medal he is wearing is from an electrical engineering convention in Cincinnati in August, 1915.

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: thank you randeclip and pennylrichardsca for the information about  Charles Proteus Steinmetz.  We will add more details to the image description.
